scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && echo "Successfully released new version $npm_package_version"
scripts.do-before-poedit: yarn build && yarn makepot && yarn updatepo && yarn copylang && yarn build
scripts.do-after-poedit: yarn build && yarn makejson && yarn copylang && yarn build
scripts.makepot: docker exec -u 33 wp-cli-dev wp i18n make-pot /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/meita-documents-and-media/ /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/meita-documents-and-media/languages/meita-documents-and-media.pot --domain=meita-documents-and-media --slug=meita-documents-and-media --debug --allow-root
scripts.updatepo: docker exec -u 33 wp-cli-dev wp i18n update-po /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/meita-documents-and-media/languages/meita-documents-and-media.pot --allow-root
scripts.makejson: docker exec -u 33 wp-cli-dev wp i18n make-json /var/www/html/wp-content/plugins/meita-documents-and-media/languages --pretty-print --no-purge --allow-root
